about_the_game:
Realistic Pest Control Experience
Pest Control Simulator offers players a chance to tackle pest infestations in homes with a highly realistic simulation experience. From tiny ants to large rats, you'll use a variety of equipment and chemicals to keep your environment pest-free.

Diverse Equipment and Strategies
You’ll be equipped with different tools to tackle various types of pests. Use sprays for small pests, electric rackets for flying bugs, and glue pads to trap larger pests like rats and scorpions. Choose the right tool for each situation to clean up the infestation effectively.

Chemicals and Upgrades
Use different types of chemicals to handle pests strategically. Burning, slowing, acid, and virus-infused sprays will help eliminate pests, with some spreading to nearby insects. Upgrade your equipment and chemicals to make your job easier as you progress.

Increasing Difficulty
As you advance through the levels, the challenge grows. You’ll face new pest types, larger infestations, and complex environments. Master your tools and strategies to stay on top of the escalating challenges.

Fun and Addictive Gameplay
With fast-paced action and calming moments, Pest Control Simulator offers an entertaining and engaging experience for players of all ages. Use your strategic thinking and timing to clear each level and defeat the pests!

  • Processor: i5 7600K / Ryzen 5 2600x
